job_history.work_description: Supervise Staff, Coordinate substitute schedule, facilitate sub placement, Supervise and monitor staff attendance, Assist in staffing highly qualified teachers, Assist Principal with developing staff meetings, Coordinate staff development, Conduct staff observations and conferences, Assist principal with team building, Generate staff warnings, Supervise and assign staff duties, Counseling, Serve as student mentor and counselor, Liaison for school counseling services, Parent Communication, Regularly meet with parents to discuss student issues and course weakness areas, Inform parents of school events or school closures, Liaison for parent teacher conferences, student discipline policies and teacher student conferences, PTO Liaison, Design School Newsletters, Authorize school reaches, Plan Development, Plan, coordinate, and supervise after school activities plus clubs, Create Staff Directory, Create Teacher's Manual, Ensure district polices and procedures are implemented, Initiate and supervise at risk Student, Supervise plus coordinate award ceremonies, athletic events, graduations, field trips and fundraisers, School Safety, Coordinate school wide climate and culture training modules, Conduct Health and Safety Meetings, Supervise Health Safety, Coordinate inter department training for Crises Prevention Intervention, Coordinate building inspections, ensure building permits are current, Inspect fire extinguishers, Implement district student discipline policies, Generate and Implement Emergency Operations Plan, Conduct monthly fire and safety drills, Supervise mandated state required safety training
Taught art grades 6-8, collaborated with staff, Administration and V.I.P.S. to support school events, Facilitated activities that developed students physical, emotional and social growth

Taught art grades 6-12, Developed and reviewed Fine Arts curriculum, Facilitated training for Fine Arts teachers, Established and coordinated Professional Development for the Harmony's Fine Arts regional and statewide training, Supervised, evaluated and Mentor teachers, Proposed and collaborated with teachers plus administration in devising strategies for school competitions and events

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in leadership roles, including supervising staff, coordinating events, and developing staff meetings, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Staff Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in supervising and managing staff, including assigning duties, conducting staff observations and conferences, and generating staff warnings, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in communicating with parents, staff, and students, including regular meetings, newsletters, and conferences, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Event Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience in planning and coordinating events, including after-school activities, award ceremonies, and fundraisers, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Safety and Emergency Management
skills.explanation: Has experience in ensuring school safety, including coordinating climate and culture training, conducting health and safety meetings, and implementing emergency operations plans, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has experience in teaching art grades 6-12, including developing curriculum and facilitating training for teachers, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Has experience in developing and reviewing Fine Arts curriculum, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Mentoring
skills.explanation: Has experience in mentoring teachers, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has some experience in managing projects, including coordinating events and developing staff meetings, but lacks extensive experience.
